healing_potion.name: Healing Potion
healing_potion.description: A vial of swirling red liquid. Restores 20 HP.

shiny_coin.name: Shiny Coin
shiny_coin.flavor_text: Could this be actual gold, or just a very convincing fake?

apple.name: Apple
apple.flavor_text: Keeps the doctor away, or so they say.

bread_loaf.name: Bread Loaf
bread_loaf.flavor_text: The simple pleasure of freshly baked bread.

fishing_net_scraps.name: Fishing Net Scraps
fishing_net_scraps.description: Torn pieces of an old fishing net.

golden_amulet.name: Golden Amulet
golden_amulet.description: A beautiful golden amulet, warm to the touch.
golden_amulet.flavor_text: It seems to hum with a faint, protective energy.

tattered_pelt.name: Tattered Pelt
tattered_pelt.description: A worn piece of animal fur.
tattered_pelt.flavor_text: Could be useful for crafting, if one had the skill.

grimy_coin.name: Grimy Coin
grimy_coin.description: A dirty, old coin. Might be worth something.

glowing_mushroom.name: Glowing Mushroom
glowing_mushroom.description: A mushroom that emits a soft, ethereal glow.

lucky_charm_figurine.name: Lucky Charm Figurine
lucky_charm_figurine.description: A small, intricately carved wooden figurine.
lucky_charm_figurine.flavor_text: It feels surprisingly warm in your hand.

scouts_map_fragment.name: Scout's Map Fragment
scouts_map_fragment.description: A piece of a map, perhaps leading somewhere interesting.
scouts_map_fragment.flavor_text: Only a part of a larger picture.

boar_tusk.name: Boar Tusk
boar_tusk.description: A sharp tusk from a wild boar.
boar_tusk.flavor_text: A trophy from a fierce beast.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.description: A fresh slab of raw meat. Needs cooking.
raw_meat.flavor_text: Best not eaten in its current state.

strange_berries.name: Strange Berries
strange_berries.flavor_text: They smell faintly sweet, but also a bit... odd.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.description: A simple cloth bandage. Heals a minor wound.
bandage.flavor_text: A traveler's best friend for small scrapes.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.flavor_text: Sturdy and reliable, if a bit plain.

worn_staff.name: Worn Staff
worn_staff.description: An old wooden staff, good for channeling energies.

simple_robes.name: Simple Robes
simple_robes.description: Basic robes often worn by apprentices.
simple_robes.flavor_text: Light and allows for ease of movement.

pair_of_daggers.name: Pair of Daggers
pair_of_daggers.description: A set of sharp, easily concealed daggers.
pair_of_daggers.flavor_text: Favored by those who prefer a quick, silent approach.

shadowy_cloak.name: Shadowy Cloak
shadowy_cloak.description: A dark cloak that helps blend into the shadows.
shadowy_cloak.flavor_text: The shadows seem to cling to its fabric.

city_map_eldoria.name: Map of Eldoria
city_map_eldoria.description: A crudely drawn map of Eldoria.
city_map_eldoria.flavor_text: Shows the main districts and points of interest.

small_pouch_of_coins.name: Small Pouch of Coins
small_pouch_of_coins.description: A few coins to get you started.
small_pouch_of_coins.flavor_text: The jingle of coins is a welcome sound.

simple_knife.name: Simple Knife
simple_knife.description: A basic utility knife. Better than nothing.
simple_knife.flavor_text: Every adventurer needs a trusty blade, however small.

blank_map_scroll.name: Blank Map Scroll
blank_map_scroll.description: A rolled-up piece of parchment. Perhaps you can view a map with this?
blank_map_scroll.flavor_text: Ready to be filled with charted territories.

ring_of_minor_vitality.name: Ring of Minor Vitality
ring_of_minor_vitality.description: A simple silver ring that hums with a faint life energy.
ring_of_minor_vitality.flavor_text: It feels warm to the touch.

charm_of_keen_eye.name: Charm of Keen Eye
charm_of_keen_eye.description: A small, polished stone on a leather thong. It seems to sharpen your focus.
charm_of_keen_eye.flavor_text: The world seems a little clearer when you wear it.
